meaningMnemonic: The kanji and the word are exactly the same. That means they share meanings as well.
readingMnemonic: The person who's holding the <vocabulary>spear</vocabulary> is a little <reading>hoe 子</reading>. It's a child who learned to fight with a hoe, and he's turned the hoe into a <vocabulary>spear</vocabulary> to fight with. Imagine him swinging his hoe spear around like a little dork.
